CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Business Days Elapsed This Month
